reviews.text: Saw their poster and was so excited to try their matcha! So creamy and yummy! The ordering process was easy and fuss-free. The ladies are very kind and friendly, even offered me a towel when I came drenched from the rain. Will definitely order again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Stumbled upon this cozy neighborhood homebase beverage shop in Bishan and decided to give it a try ‚Äî definitely coming back again! The matcha was incredibly smooth and gao, just the way I like it. The owners were so warm and friendly ‚Äî even kindly allowed BYO *please ignore my ugly cup ü´£. Had such a nice chat with them. What a great way to kick-start another workday with a solid cup of matcha!

Came across their poster & decided to give their Hojicha a try, after all, who‚Äôs going to reject the idea of having an iced Hojicha on a hot day?

Anyways, I ordered their iced Hojicha Oat, as recommended by one of the sisters and wow it was really a fantastic drink, the Hojicha coupled with the oat milk produced a very nice milky texture and only regret I had was not buying another cup!

Please give this a try should you ever pass by Bishan!!

Chanced upon this home-based shop and decided to give it a try! The sisters are v friendly and the matcha latte is thick and nice!
Matcha cravings satisfied‚ú®
